about_the_game:
AmazoMysterious Trail

Embark on this incredible adventure through the forests of Latin America, where the warrior must find a rare plant in the mountainous areas of the Amazon to cure his wife. Accompanied by his daughter and his little monkey, he faces dangers and teaches his daughter how to protect herself.

Setting :

- Explore the mysterious Amazon rainforest, filled with enigmatic symbols, ancient monuments, and natural dangers.

Enemies :

- Encounter hostile creatures, from agile predators in the treetops to ambushes hidden in the vegetation.

Collectibles :

- Collect golden fruits to earn points, green fruits to restore health, and purple fruits to recover the girl's energy.

Movements :

- Master a variety of agile maneuvers, including walking, running, double jumping, punching, and kicking. Use mid-air control to cross chasms and overcome obstacles.

Game Features :

- Immersive 3D Graphics: Experience the vibrant and dangerous Amazon in stunning detail.

- Dynamic Combat: Use the girl's special attacks to turn the tide of battle in your favor.

- Puzzles: Solve intriguing puzzles to advance the story.
detailed_description:
AmazoMysterious Trail

Embark on this incredible adventure through the forests of Latin America, where the warrior must find a rare plant in the mountainous areas of the Amazon to cure his wife. Accompanied by his daughter and his little monkey, he faces dangers and teaches his daughter how to protect herself.

Setting :

Collectibles :

Movements :

- Master a variety of agile maneuvers, including walking, running, double jumping, punching, and kicking. Use mid-air control to cross chasms and overcome obstacles.

Game Features :

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 8800GT 512 Mb /AMD Radeon R7 260 or superior
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 460 1GB or superior
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS/OS X 10.11 (El Capitan) ou posterior
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 8800GT 512 Mb /AMD Radeon R7 260 or superior
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 460 1GB or superior
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Amazo'

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 8800GT 512 Mb /AMD Radeon R7 260 or superior
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 460 1GB or superior
  • Storage: 500mb MB available space

short_description: It's a 3D action game with platforming elements set in the Amazon rainforest. In it, you will face mysterious enemies, perform double jumps to reach high places, and avoid falling into deep chasms. During your journey, you will be assisted by a little girl and a monkey.
